home.kyons: Kyons, a modern education platform using artificial intelligence (AI), is an effective assistant to help students achieve the desired score in the shortest time with a personalized learning path.

features.youDontKnow:
Don’t know where to start?
Let AI help you!
features.detectKnowledgeHolesDesc: Smart Mock Tests help to detect your weaknesses and focus on reviewing them.
features.learningPathDesc: Lessons are generated based on your learning goals and abilities to optimize revision process.
features.practiceWithDesc: Unlimited numbers of review questions generated by AI with different levels of difficulty

students.completeLearning: 4 steps to get desired scores easily with Kyons
students.step1Desc: Kickstart your learning journey by setting your own review goals (subject, grade, and test term).
students.step2Desc: The next step is taking the initial mock test to get a better grip on your current level which will be recorded and analyzed in the system.
students.step3:
Step 3:
Practice with learning path generated by AI
students.step3Desc: Based on your performance, AI will generate a personalised and constantly updated learning path that matches your level and progress.
students.step4:
Step 4:
Revise at your own pace with 24/7 support
students.step4Desc: Every question is tailor-made to match your ability. Kyons has your back with detailed solutions, topic breakdowns to identify knowledge gaps, and one-on-one support to help you whenever you get stuck.

schools.usefulTool: An all-in-one platform to monitor student's learning progress
schools.kyonsSchool: Welcome to Kyons School,  a unique collaboration between Kyons and Cerebry - an education partner from Singapore. This platform provides teachers with a smart classroom management solution to closely monitor student's learning progress and refine teaching methods when necessary as soon as possible.
schools.have1Desc: Personalised learning path that matches competencies and receptive abilities of every student.
schools.have2Desc: Practice questions are constantly updated and generated by AI to align precisely with the distinct educational requirements.
schools.have3Desc: Teachers can quickly assign and assess homework progress of the entire class.
schools.have4Desc: Kyons will help educators effortlessly generate exams, along with setting completion timeframes for student.

aboutUs.text1: Built by passionate yet practical learners, Kyons is on a mission to create a learning solution from learners' perspective to solve learners' problems.
aboutUs.text2: We believe learning is a journey that should be fun enough to be on and short enough for one to realise their ultimate dream in the quickest and most efficient way.
aboutUs.ethos: Accelerated by World Bank and SUNY-Korea
aboutUs.antler: Invested by Antler Vietnam Venture Capital

solution.mockTestDesc: Once you have defined your goals, we will provide a test to identify any gaps in your knowledge.
solution.registerNow:
Feeling interested?
Create an account right now!
solution.yourLearningPathDesc: Based on your test results and learning progress, Kyons proprietary AI will determine what you should learn next, giving you a personalised curriculum that makes your learning more efficient than ever.
solution.tutorDesc: If you get stuck anywhere on your learning journey, an on-demand tutor is always a click away to come to your assistance.

creator.kyonsCreatorDesc: You are a teacher and want to earn more income by contributing to Kyons' question bank? Click the "Join us" button to learn more!
